00687c9ad8074d4f792c5f4ec3339132da1e5384.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofilepackage (package_name, server_profile_id)
            SELECT package_name, $2
            FROM UNNEST($1::text[])
            as t(package_name)
            ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

044c83becc9a4280aa888bab7106a2fb5501c1a2.query:
SELECT
                (n.id).name AS "name!",
                (n.id).id AS "id!",
                cluster_id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
                FROM corosync_node n
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $1 = 'ASC' THEN n.id END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN $1 = 'DESC' THEN n.id END DESC
                OFFSET $2 LIMIT $3

046635a93b52edbebece125556cfeecd193704ba.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource_bans
            USING corosync_node_managed_host
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND node = (corosync_node_id).name
            AND id != ALL($2)

07317ab9fddc66855470ba840c4b68a340b188ea.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_managedhost
        (
            state_modified_at,
            state,
            immutable_state,
            not_deleted,
            address,
            fqdn,
            nodename,
            boot_time,
            needs_update,
            corosync_ring0,
            install_method,
            content_type_id,
            server_profile_id)
        VALUES
        ('2020-07-02 15:50:34.356076-04', 'unconfigured', 'f', 't', 'foo', 'foo.bar', '', Null, 'f', '', '', Null, 'foo')
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

07d03b70c5d9813b0432b582ad8239edd1a3ce7e.query: select id from chroma_core_managedfilesystem where name = $1 and not_deleted = 't'

084655890401e11e6b6530ec7ae7ca8b62c7851d.query: select id, content_type_id from chroma_core_managedhost where fqdn = $1 and not_deleted = 't'

08fab7405a3d457c6c5774a5dd7bf683f0529ba3.query:
DELETE from chroma_core_sfacontroller
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

1167f9862155b35e2bb59ba77286ccfc35c7f611.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfastoragesystem
        (
            uuid,
            platform,
            health_state_reason,
            health_state,
            child_health_state
        )
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
        ON CONFLICT (uuid) DO UPDATE
        SET
            platform = excluded.platform,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state

11c0f67f66af2d8562fd6f5f2d9f77f5ce4b55ac.query:
SELECT * FROM chroma_core_logmessage t
                    WHERE ($4::TEXT IS NULL OR t.message LIKE $4)
                      AND ($5::TEXT IS NULL OR t.fqdn LIKE $5)
                      AND ($6::TEXT IS NULL OR t.tag LIKE $6)
                      AND ($7::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR t.datetime >= $7)
                      AND ($8::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR t.datetime < $8)
                      AND ARRAY[t.message_class] <@ $9
                      AND t.severity <= $10
                    ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN t.datetime END ASC,
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN t.datetime END DESC
                    OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

12b85bdac2a34efedc73bb817f38fd589a8e2754.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfadiskdrive
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            failed,
            slot_number,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            member_index,
            member_state,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::integer[],
            $3::bool[],
            $4::integer[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[],
            $7::smallint[],
            $8::smallint[],
            $9::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            enclosure_index = excluded.enclosure_index,
            failed = excluded.failed,
            slot_number = excluded.slot_number,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            member_index = excluded.member_index,
            member_state = excluded.member_state

131959cfcc0275c8797cb5aa12f0ad15dd6baa2f.query: select fqdn from chroma_core_managedhost where id = $1 and not_deleted = 't'

17645262c426038efcc8e22bf999c0d3cee07f52.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:ReserveUnit",
                    last_run,
                    keep_num
                FROM snapshot_retention

1abfa2e9edeb822cb74fe23011a079b9396e9e49.query:
SELECT
            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type as "sub_target_type: _",
            job_type as "job_type: _",
            state as "state: _",
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfajob

1bcbed2e431ad27c5f4969dab2089990e1461162.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_logmessage
             (datetime, fqdn, severity, facility, tag, message, message_class)
             SELECT datetime, $2, severity, facility, source, message, message_class
             FROM UNNEST($1::timestamptz[], $3::smallint[], $4::smallint[], $5::text[], $6::text[], $7::smallint[])
             AS t(datetime, severity, facility, source, message, message_class)

1bf24ca51d2bf55e540075c7041fba7cd1b45ed0.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofile
                (
                    name,
                    ui_name,
                    ui_description,
                    managed,
                    worker,
                    user_selectable,
                    initial_state,
                    ntp,
                    corosync,
                    corosync2,
                    pacemaker,
                    "default"
                )
                VALUES
                ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, 'true', $6, $7, $8, $9, $10, 'false')
                ON CONFLICT (name)
                DO UPDATE
                SET
                ui_name = excluded.ui_name,
                ui_description = excluded.ui_description,
                managed = excluded.managed,
                worker = excluded.worker,
                user_selectable = excluded.user_selectable,
                initial_state = excluded.initial_state,
                ntp = excluded.ntp,
                corosync = excluded.corosync,
                corosync2 = excluded.corosync2,
                pacemaker = excluded.pacemaker,
                "default" = excluded.default

1c2f3195b457e4cb39dc074d9474891d4fa7a481.query:
DELETE from chroma_core_sfapowersupply
            WHERE (index, storage_system, enclosure_index)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[], $3::int[])
            )

1f0a3d6d1b9f42c2eeca372f6a030e7601521480.query: select * from chroma_core_managedhost where fqdn = $1 and not_deleted = 't'

2db6c6e2bc02944f022d67400d05d66d0df93160.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_cluster
            USING corosync_node_managed_host
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND cluster_id = id
            AND corosync_nodes != $2::corosync_node_key[]

321e561cd3b4279dba46176519f5ac2644785954.query:
INSERT INTO network_interface 
                (mac_address, name, inet4_address, inet6_address, lnd_type, state_up, host_id)
                SELECT mac_address, name, string_to_array(inet4_address, ',')::inet[], string_to_array(inet6_address, ',')::inet[], lnd_type, state_up, host_id
                FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::text[], $3::text[], $4::text[], $5::lnd_network_type[], $6::bool[], $7::int[])
                AS t(mac_address, name, inet4_address, inet6_address, lnd_type, state_up, host_id)
                ON CONFLICT (mac_address)
                    DO
                    UPDATE SET  name          = EXCLUDED.name,
                                inet4_address = EXCLUDED.inet4_address,
                                inet6_address = EXCLUDED.inet6_address,
                                lnd_type      = EXCLUDED.lnd_type,
                                state_up      = EXCLUDED.state_up,
                                host_id       = EXCLUDED.host_id

36188079437a0e3df0d4584e22b15673bfadcf66.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_node
            USING corosync_node_managed_host
            WHERE id = corosync_node_id
            AND host_id = $1
            AND corosync_node_id != ALL($2::corosync_node_key[])

374ad6635a835d9d4d511f75f80c9e83cfd39093.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource (
            id,
            cluster_id,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node,
            mount_point
        )
        SELECT
            id,
            $12,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node::corosync_node_key,
            mount_point
        FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::text[],
                $4::bool[],
                $5::bool[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::bool[],
                $8::bool[],
                $9::int[],
                $10::text[],
                $11::text[]
            )
            AS t(
            id,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node,
            mount_point
            )
            ON CONFLICT (id, cluster_id) DO UPDATE
            SET
                resource_agent = excluded.resource_agent,
                role = excluded.role,
                active = excluded.active,
                orphaned = excluded.orphaned,
                managed = excluded.managed,
                failed = excluded.failed,
                failure_ignored = excluded.failure_ignored,
                nodes_running_on = excluded.nodes_running_on,
                active_node = excluded.active_node,
                mount_point = excluded.mount_point

39fc1211724cef9afd733459348bcd3eb6f3af9a.query:
SELECT * FROM chroma_core_job
        WHERE id IN (SELECT job_id from chroma_core_command_jobs
            WHERE command_id = $1)

3a099c680488372f27c087f941161200360329a2.query:
INSERT INTO snapshot_interval (
                    filesystem_name,
                    use_barrier,
                    interval
                )
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
                ON CONFLICT (filesystem_name, interval)
                DO NOTHING
                RETURNING id

3b1ddcee3dee96365325874c4ea32c832ffd74ab.query:
SELECT
                    c.id AS id,
                    cancelled,
                    complete,
                    errored,
                    created_at,
                    array_agg(cj.job_id)::INT[] AS job_ids,
                    message
                FROM chroma_core_command c
                JOIN chroma_core_command_jobs cj ON c.id = cj.command_id
                WHERE (c.id = ANY ($3::INT[]))
                GROUP BY c.id
                OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

3cb1094d7efdccbf02af2f702d8c6accea293012.query:
SELECT b.id, b.resource, b.node, b.cluster_id, nh.host_id, t.mount_point
            FROM corosync_resource_bans b
            INNER JOIN corosync_node_managed_host nh ON (nh.corosync_node_id).name = b.node
            AND nh.cluster_id = b.cluster_id
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource t ON t.id = b.resource AND b.cluster_id = t.cluster_id
            WHERE t.mount_point != NULL

414a5b7c63ec04ad876c282460de775c0e919c10.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfacontroller
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::int[],
            $2::int[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            enclosure_index = excluded.enclosure_index,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state

457c805cf2fb6b16d6b42b2662c7f2569d1261d6.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_task (
                    name,
                    start,
                    state,
                    fids_total,
                    fids_completed,
                    fids_failed,
                    data_transfered,
                    single_runner,
                    keep_failed,
                    actions,
                    args,
                    filesystem_id
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    now(),
                    $2,
                    0,
                    0,
                    0,
                    0,
                    $3,
                    $4,
                    $5,
                    $6,
                    $7
                )
                RETURNING *

45af175923382837733407cab5f3fa02f1a14ea4.query: SELECT active_host_id from target WHERE filesystems @> $1 and name='MGS'

45e66b9722e3f0ea68049efc3ce9a52ac0ccc202.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:snapshot::ReserveUnit",
                    last_run,
                    keep_num
                FROM snapshot_retention

49bd9f25a94b082053121c3dacc67f7363340f5e.query:
SELECT t.name, t.dev_path, h.fqdn
            FROM target t
            INNER JOIN chroma_core_managedhost h
            ON t.active_host_id = h.id
            WHERE $1 = ANY(t.filesystems)
            AND h.not_deleted = 't'

4eb28fbaf2c42bbcc852c074ade355c4f29c318d.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_node (
                id,
                cluster_id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            )
            SELECT
                id::corosync_node_key,
                $13,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::bool[],
                $3::bool[],
                $4::bool[],
                $5::bool[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::bool[],
                $8::bool[],
                $9::bool[],
                $10::bool[],
                $11::int[],
                $12::text[]
            )
            AS t(
                id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            )
            ON CONFLICT (id, cluster_id) DO UPDATE
            SET
                online = excluded.online,
                standby = excluded.standby,
                standby_onfail = excluded.standby_onfail,
                maintenance = excluded.maintenance,
                pending = excluded.pending,
                unclean = excluded.unclean,
                shutdown = excluded.shutdown,
                expected_up = excluded.expected_up,
                is_dc = excluded.is_dc,
                resources_running = excluded.resources_running,
                type = excluded.type

4f16874f4506c43628a3d68844fbe89fd9bd59cd.query:
SELECT id FROM corosync_cluster
            WHERE corosync_nodes = $1::corosync_node_key[]

554681d480739b966bb4fafc141ce924e3d4edaf.query:

            id,
            is_superuser,

5755ec79ff7be6cdfe0ba5fa9c2cd9c280a99db0.query:
DELETE FROM chroma_core_fidtaskqueue 
        WHERE id in ( 
            SELECT id FROM chroma_core_fidtaskqueue WHERE task_id = $1 LIMIT $2 FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED 
        ) RETURNING id, fid as "fid: _", data, task_id

590a26c2f79e7fadfff3866f32f726edf0b4c27f.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_node_managed_host (host_id, cluster_id, corosync_node_id)
            VALUES($1, $2, $3::corosync_node_key)
            ON CONFLICT (host_id, corosync_node_id, cluster_id)
            DO NOTHING

5bdec4fbd7f7d0a23b72c2deb5a96068d3b63690.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfapowersupply
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::integer[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system, enclosure_index) DO UPDATE
        SET
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            position = excluded.position

5c10aa83d6be60751c3216531939d4050cffa43f.query:

            uuid,
            platform,
            health_state_reason,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: HealthState"
        FROM chroma_core_sfastoragesystem

61e498856043c03a2b0ca70544b3973f25ab9154.query:

                SELECT $1, repo_id
                FROM UNNEST($2::text[])
                AS t(repo_id)
                ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

628b472cfdf32ba54540531b117c31b3787c03b0.query:
DELETE FROM snapshot
            WHERE (filesystem_name, snapshot_name) NOT IN (SELECT * FROM UNNEST ($1::text[], $2::text[]))

6981275b14db0bca4de21c63c9e9032f7a2f3271.query:
DELETE from chroma_core_sfajob
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

6d7c1af5cf5e15bc84444013fa6989b6317052dc.query:
INSERT INTO snapshot (filesystem_name, snapshot_name, create_time, modify_time, snapshot_fsname, mounted, comment)
            SELECT * FROM
            UNNEST (
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::timestamp[],
                $4::timestamp[],
                $5::text[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::text[]
            )
            ON CONFLICT (filesystem_name, snapshot_name) DO UPDATE
            SET
                create_time = excluded.create_time,
                modify_time = excluded.modify_time,
                snapshot_fsname = excluded.snapshot_fsname,
                mounted = excluded.mounted,
                comment = excluded.comment

6f3c08f058a72efb6a3926dbe47380662c1eb80e.query:
SELECT jsonb_agg((r.repo_name, r.location))
                    AS repos, sp.*
                    FROM chroma_core_repo AS r
                    INNER JOIN chroma_core_serverprofile_repolist AS rl ON r.repo_name = rl.repo_id
                    INNER JOIN chroma_core_serverprofile AS sp ON rl.serverprofile_id = sp.name
                    GROUP BY sp.name;

7ba0b27a4f4fca50c30701d9adbbf0c0421c310b.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource_managed_host (host_id, cluster_id, corosync_resource_id)
                SELECT $1, $2, corosync_resource_id FROM UNNEST($3::text[]) as corosync_resource_id
                ON CONFLICT (host_id, corosync_resource_id, cluster_id)
                DO NOTHING

7bee1c38d05ac3f8bcf4d48b375c740341121c04.query:

            state = 'mounted'

8005758717333205858491c0874387c530265e82.query:

            SET message = $1
            WHERE
                id = $2

808baf8439b048c53e177a52f7b24bef71bef707.query:

8a7e849cf7654907787343223c017f302c514e47.query: SELECT total_rows FROM rowcount WHERE table_name = 'chroma_core_logmessage';

8ac87d0e2c016985d993de3824a253423b3aa038.query:

                SET last_run=$1
                WHERE id=$2 AND filesystem_name=$3

8cb590d72a1f4577a8198ad04c9331da9b65ae93.query: SELECT id FROM chroma_core_managedfilesystem WHERE name=$1 and not_deleted = 't'

903636cd946e4fb1f28ae3774b58c46f8bb60180.query:
SELECT 
            index,

            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: _",
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfacontroller

922e7457db1e165807273def66a5ecc6b22be1a8.query:
DELETE FROM chroma_core_logmessage
                WHERE id in ( 
                    SELECT id FROM chroma_core_logmessage ORDER BY id LIMIT $1
                )

9472740d062c38f49e290c6173d7b676329a956c.query: select fqdn, id from chroma_core_managedhost where not_deleted = 't'

9bc21bd7e2f9506e3ae0cb80fd80e0fc95243470.query: SELECT * FROM snapshot WHERE filesystem_name = $1 ORDER BY create_time ASC

9edb0846023aa1a9250204fb686d5b95a95962ce.query:
SELECT * from chroma_core_stepresult
            WHERE job_id = ANY($1)
            ORDER BY modified_at DESC

a3269a5f7c491a332facfcf86c576350f4b9e7c1.query:
SELECT
            id,
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            failed,
            slot_number,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            health_state_reason,
            member_index,
            member_state as "member_state: MemberState",
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfadiskdrive

a36f75c883918331f080025b809fb0d2ebf00ef9.query:
SELECT * from target t
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN t.name END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN t.name END DESC
                OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

a8110847776ee7220577529cf0e395fe9ef3d72f.query:
SELECT
                    c.id AS id,
                    cancelled,
                    complete,
                    errored,
                    created_at,
                    array_agg(cj.job_id)::INT[] AS job_ids,
                    message
                FROM chroma_core_command c
                JOIN chroma_core_command_jobs cj ON c.id = cj.command_id
                WHERE ($4::BOOL IS NULL OR complete = $4)
                  AND ($5::TEXT IS NULL OR c.message ILIKE '%' || $5 || '%')
                GROUP BY c.id
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN c.id END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN c.id END DESC
                OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

acce0ef57e02705ad538be4229e49aca7b61cab3.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_cluster (corosync_nodes)
                VALUES ($1::corosync_node_key[])
                ON CONFLICT (corosync_nodes) DO NOTHING

b04b6d9456e4fbd6b7c97cb633393b8971701303.query: SELECT repo_name from chroma_core_repo where repo_name = ANY($1)

b0991443ae430ca73d4369f314b88f731ead796e.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_alertstate
            SET active = Null, "end" = now()
            WHERE
                active = true
                AND alert_item_id = $1
                AND record_type = ANY($2)

b14693e89ec9b45e2f3dafa0e4ea7298618ea653.query:
SELECT
            id,
            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type as "sub_target_type: SubTargetType",
            job_type as "job_type: JobType",
            state as "state: JobState",
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfajob

b1e963ddcdd8d96cdf8cf3e948ff691ba13172fb.query:
SELECT id, cluster_id, resource, node, weight, master_only
            FROM corosync_resource_bans

b35da5f6c785076d4e7b578ebce9678f7eae5d22.query: SELECT fqdn FROM chroma_core_managedhost WHERE id=$1 and not_deleted = 't'

b4865dbd455de729bbadd116bf6bf72108582704.query:
SELECT
            index,
            element_name,
            health_state as "health_state: _",
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: _",
            model,
            position,
            enclosure_type as "enclosure_type: _",
            canister_location,
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfaenclosure

b8e774ab32b79eb3f2d87b7f373b609831f72f63.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofile
        (name, ui_name, ui_description, managed, worker, user_selectable, initial_state, ntp, corosync, corosync2, pacemaker, "default")
        VALUES
        ('foo', 'foo', 'foo', 'f', 'f', 't', 'bar', 'f', 'f', 'f', 'f', 't')
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

b90d797530fd50b0596cbdc7bce108066fc5c4e8.query: SELECT id, filesystem_name, snapshot_name, snapshot_fsname FROM snapshot

b92506b46f4f927f6900c498084e5a60d76bc004.query:
SELECT rh.cluster_id, r.id, t.name, t.mount_path, t.filesystems, array_agg(DISTINCT rh.host_id) AS "cluster_hosts!"
            FROM target t
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource r ON r.mount_point = t.mount_path
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource_managed_host rh ON rh.corosync_resource_id = r.id AND rh.host_id = ANY(t.host_ids)
            WHERE CARDINALITY(t.filesystems) > 0
            GROUP BY rh.cluster_id, t.name, r.id, t.mount_path, t.filesystems

b94684b98d9c2877a51d94070b43e039ea62218c.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofile
            (
                name,
                ui_name,
                ui_description,
                managed,
                worker,
                user_selectable,
                initial_state,
                ntp,
                corosync,
                corosync2,
                pacemaker,
                "default"
            )
            VALUES
            ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, 'true', $6, $7, $8, $9, $10, 'false')
            ON CONFLICT (name)
            DO UPDATE
            SET
            ui_name = excluded.ui_name,
            ui_description = excluded.ui_description,
            managed = excluded.managed,
            worker = excluded.worker,
            user_selectable = excluded.user_selectable,
            initial_state = excluded.initial_state,
            ntp = excluded.ntp,
            corosync = excluded.corosync,
            corosync2 = excluded.corosync2,
            pacemaker = excluded.pacemaker,
            "default" = excluded.default

bb7fb337cfeac9a17eefb21a498e76be70c2f395.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_device
        (fqdn, devices)
        VALUES ($1, $2)
        ON CONFLICT (fqdn) DO UPDATE
        SET devices = EXCLUDED.devices

beba469f5047ef7449f5e4fc77e04ded6264098d.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_lustreclientmount
            SET 
                mountpoints = array[]::text[],
                state = 'unmounted',
                state_modified_at = now()
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND id != ALL($2)

bec714dda53dc06d09fcebc82d0db1559923c53d.query:
SELECT filesystem_name, snapshot_name, create_time, modify_time, snapshot_fsname, mounted, comment FROM snapshot s
                    WHERE filesystem_name = $4 AND ($5::text IS NULL OR snapshot_name = $5)
                    ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN s.create_time END ASC,
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN s.create_time END DESC
                    OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

c0976422207fb3d2a45cc9f4cc6182133c51442f.query: SELECT fqdn FROM chroma_core_managedhost WHERE id = $1

c1f4bafd0cac4a502df6be1e6546debc7b4afcaa.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_task
            SET 
                fids_completed = fids_completed + $1,
                fids_failed = fids_failed + $2
            WHERE id = $3

c4699fe75876e33df71163c95690a4680f8bee66.query:
SELECT
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state as "health_state: _",
            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfapowersupply

c794f65b5ef4d77224667f77df480d76eaee130d.query:
DELETE from chroma_core_sfaenclosure
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

d164e8a38cf147e2c759e39ab1986dac7b33a492.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource
            USING corosync_resource_managed_host
            WHERE id = corosync_resource_id
            AND corosync_resource_id != ALL($1)
            AND host_id = $2

d21d5385bab3f2131870f7eb192ae2e6a6e44ea4.query: select id from django_content_type where model = 'lustreclientmount'

d39baa07d0445a4eba48fc86c3b328706606d65b.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_alertstate
        (
            record_type,
            variant,
            alert_item_id,
            alert_type,
            begin,
            message,
            active,
            dismissed,
            severity,
            lustre_pid,
            alert_item_type_id
        )
        VALUES ($1, '{}', $2, $1, now(), $3, true, false, $4, $5, $6)
        ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

d6b4367df2c3c035c560763054e4658c5e043c28.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource_bans (id, cluster_id, resource, node, weight, master_only)
            SELECT
                id,
                $6,
                resource,
                node,
                weight,
                master_only
            FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::text[],
                $4::int[],
                $5::bool[]
            )
            AS t(
                id,
                resource,
                node,
                weight,
                master_only
            )
            ON CONFLICT (id, cluster_id, resource, node) DO UPDATE
            SET
                weight = excluded.weight,
                master_only = excluded.master_only

d7098e256b9c915f2ac0a8ddf278468e824bce89.query:
SELECT
            id,
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        FROM chroma_core_sfapowersupply

d7d2f630597f24da27fd997508e60805e8e626e7.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_lustreclientmount
        (host_id, filesystem, mountpoints, state, state_modified_at, immutable_state, not_deleted, content_type_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'mounted', now(), 'f', 't', $4)
        ON CONFLICT (host_id, filesystem, not_deleted) DO UPDATE
        SET 
            mountpoints = excluded.mountpoints,
            state = excluded.state,
            state_modified_at = excluded.state_modified_at
        RETURNING id

da7a10e4d6f2a2456eccd0753df9d743ebcaebff.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_fidtaskerror (fid, task_id, data, errno)
                                                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

dc969e1cf438fc20baccd36a43cf7725bcf95cf7.query:
INSERT INTO snapshot_retention (
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit,
                    keep_num
                )
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
                ON CONFLICT (filesystem_name)
                DO UPDATE SET
                reserve_value = EXCLUDED.reserve_value,
                reserve_unit = EXCLUDED.reserve_unit,
                keep_num = EXCLUDED.keep_num

dd39a580b805c4895fab2a9a108f11a4144d9742.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfajob
        (
            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type,
            job_type,
            state,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::integer[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::smallint[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            sub_target_index = excluded.sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type = excluded.sub_target_type,
            job_type = excluded.job_type,
            state = excluded.state

dd61465efa2dff810cdba4f03b23919dfe84e4fa.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource_managed_host
            WHERE corosync_resource_id != ALL($1)
            AND host_id = $2

e211fee58a58a67ae21206e84802a76ce81d15f4.query:
SELECT
            id,
            filesystem_name,
            reserve_value,
            reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:ReserveUnit",
            last_run,
            keep_num
        FROM snapshot_retention

e8f95e79d22bae021629cbfef5291601d0001933.query:
select * from chroma_core_task 
        where 
            filesystem_id = $1
            and state <> 'closed'
            and fids_total > fids_completed 
            and (running_on_id is Null or running_on_id = $2)

e9138dc17d5e21a863ab1bb897f2f98a6f7a61b0.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_sfaenclosure
        (
            index,
            element_name,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state,
            model,
            position,
            enclosure_type,
            canister_location,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::text[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[],
            $7::smallint[],
            $8::smallint[],
            $9::text[],
            $10::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state,
            element_name = excluded.element_name,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            position = excluded.position,
            enclosure_type = excluded.enclosure_type

e97e41ee7351b4ee4362648015b98d3bf7618e8c.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofile_repolist (serverprofile_id, repo_id)
            SELECT $1, repo_id
            FROM UNNEST($2::text[])
            AS t(repo_id)
            ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

ec70b9a5caeadc31f5d1359737cc1c6da64e41db.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_task
            SET running_on_id = $1
                WHERE id = $2
                AND running_on_id is Null

eec700b9428870eec0c867b7663c22c369f5bb4b.query:
DELETE from chroma_core_sfadiskdrive
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

f3d07e6786deccc4cf6ffce6d37772de8b5387d2.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_fidtaskqueue (fid, data, task_id)
            SELECT row(seq, oid, ver)::lustre_fid, data, $5
            FROM UNNEST($1::bigint[], $2::int[], $3::int[], $4::jsonb[])
            AS t(seq, oid, ver, data)

f4165ef6b0015f9503e88fafa27d7e5dc1e6c715.query:
INSERT INTO target
                        (state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path)
                        SELECT state, name, active_host_id, string_to_array(host_ids, ',')::int[], string_to_array(filesystems, ',')::text[], uuid, mount_path, dev_path
                        FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::text[], $3::int[], $4::text[], $5::text[], $6::text[], $7::text[], $8::text[])
                        AS t(state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path)
                        ON CONFLICT (uuid)
                            DO
                            UPDATE SET  state          = EXCLUDED.state,
                                        name           = EXCLUDED.name,
                                        active_host_id = EXCLUDED.active_host_id,
                                        host_ids       = EXCLUDED.host_ids,
                                        filesystems    = EXCLUDED.filesystems,
                                        mount_path     = EXCLUDED.mount_path,
                                        dev_path       = EXCLUDED.dev_path

f54d394219c5dfe5a5a55ea217b5b37a5768ca75.query:
UPDATE chroma_core_task
        SET fids_total = fids_total + $1
        WHERE id = $2

fa7bdf3c5e49361f1afaa6a2075745f0943c461a.query:
SELECT 
                index,
                enclosure_index,
                failed,
                slot_number,
                health_state  as "health_state: _",
                health_state_reason,
                member_index,
                member_state as "member_state: _",
                storage_system
            FROM chroma_core_sfadiskdrive

fed610ec991f5563f72a042573293f69b13ca76d.query:
INSERT INTO chroma_core_serverprofilepackage (package_name, server_profile_id)
                SELECT package_name, $2
                FROM UNNEST($1::text[])
                as t(package_name)
                ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
